interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Review Date: 2019/10/09
Store: Natural Solution
Product Description: ['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. Benefits: 1- Exfoliates and removes dead skin cells 2- Moisturizes and nourishes the skin 3- Protects the skin from free radicals 4- Leaves skin feeling smooth and soft 5-Suitable for all skin types']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.75 x 3.75 x 3.6 inches; 12.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '8246E', 'UPC': '818581019775', 'Manufacturer': 'Natural Solution'}
Review Text: Unfortunately, when I first used this, it caused a rash. I passed it on to a friend of mine, who seems to like it. Saying, "her skin feels so soft and smooth."
Review Title: Sharing with friends
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Natural Solution Himalayan Pink Salt Body Scrub with Organic Marula Essential Oil, Moisturizes and Nourishes Face & Skin - 12.3 Oz
Natural Solution
['Natural Solution Organic Marula Oil Body Scrub Exfoliate and nourish your skin with this luxurious Natural Solution body scrub made with organic marula oil. Marula oil is a natural oil & is known for its ability to moisturize and protect the skin, as well as to reduce the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines. This body scrub is also made with Himalayan pink salt, which is a natural exfoliator that helps to remove dead skin cells and leave your skin feeling smooth and soft. The scrub is gentle enough for daily use, and it is perfect for all skin types. Usage: Apply a generous amount of scrub to wet skin. Massage in circular motions for 2-3 minutes. Rinse with water. Use 2 times per week for best results. Caution: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse immediately with water. Keep out of reach of children. Store in a cool, dry place. profile:
The user exhibits a preference for natural and organic skincare products that emphasize moisturizing and nourishing properties. They seem to appreciate body scrubs that incorporate natural exfoliators, reflecting an interest in products that enhance skin smoothness and softness. However, this interaction indicates a cautious approach to skincare; the user experienced an adverse reaction (rash) to the product, which suggests a sensitivity to certain formulations. This caution is compounded by the review's low rating, indicating dissatisfaction with the product's performance on their skin.

On a positive note, the user appears to value sharing experiences with friends, as they passed the product on to someone else who benefited from it. This implies a social aspect to their preferences—likely favoring products that work well for others and can be recommended in a communal context. Overall, the user's profile reflects a desire for effective, gentle skincare solutions with a strong inclination towards natural ingredients, tempered by a need for sensitivity to their skin’s reactions.
